text: <!channel> :tada:HOLIDAY PARTY 2.0 is almost here!:tada: It’s tomorrow! at 6pm! at Union/Pine! Woo!!!! Let me know if you have questions!

<!channel> - Hi All - For some of you Vacation and DTO balances in Bamboo are not correct as of Jan 1. We are working on figuring this out and correcting it. I will have further updates soon. If you are having issues or need to request vacation or dto time but don’t believe your balances are correct, DM me.

<!channel> Afternoon Everyone,

We are ready to begin accepting applications for this year's Internship Program!

I am hoping all of you will spread the word through your social media channels that we are now accepting applications.

You can link to our most recent blog post:

<http://www.uncorkedstudios.com/blog/uncorked-studios'-summer-internship-program-turns-six-this-year/>

and direct folks  to our internship page: <http://www.uncorkedstudios.com/internships/>

Please help us spread the word!

attachments.title: The Uncorked Studios' Summer Internship Program Turns Six this Year!
attachments.text: Our interns have had their hands in all sorts of projects here at the studio—many of which display our culture of curiosity and knack for prototyping. From creating an interactive sandbox that playfully changes color in response to each user’s gestures to building robotic arms that respond to facial expressions, our interns have run the gamut on experimentation. But an internship at Uncorked involves more than just internal or self-driven projects, as some of our interns have also had the chance to contribute to our larger endeavors, such as helping to build Sommely (an intelligent IoT wine tracking system) or participating in the development of our latest installation for Google’s BrandLab team.
attachments.fallback: The Uncorked Studios' Summer Internship Program Turns Six this Year!

attachments.title: Uncorked Studios | Internships
attachments.text: Uncorked Studios is looking for summer interns!

text: <!channel> If you haven’t already, please get your AVP hours into Harvest! :slightly_smiling_face: I will be reconciling tomorrow! :tada::shuffleparrot::heart_eyes_cat:
